definition: to make an inventory/to take stock

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Next week we shall be closed for stock-taking.
sentences.chinese: 下星期我們暫停營業盤點存貨。

sentences.english: They checked out all the goods in the store.
sentences.chinese: 他們把商店中所有貨品都進行了盤點。

sentences.english: Coordinate & lead regular cycle count, take active part in stock-take; be responsible for the inventory accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 通過對庫存進行週期性盤點，以保證庫存準確性。

sentences.english: The company will make an inventory of the warehouse this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午公司要清倉盤點貨物。

sentences.english: Warehouse and inventory physical count plan, execution and record and adjust in SAP.
sentences.chinese: 盤點計劃，執行，記錄和系統調賬。

sentences.english: JD carried out an elegant bathroom vanities and a large stock one.
sentences.chinese: 法學博士進行了時尚的單浴室面盆大盤點。

sentences.english: Inventories these actors, is also is inventorying Xie Dao "the masterpiece".
sentences.chinese: 盤點這些演員，也就是在盤點謝導的“傑作”。

sentences.english: Inventories these actors, is also is inventorying Xie Dao "the masterpiece".
sentences.chinese: 盤點這些演員，也就是在盤點謝導的“傑作”。

sentences.english: The warehouse is closed for the annual stocktaking.
sentences.chinese: 倉庫關門進行年度存貨盤點。

sentences.english: 3 to avoid any error that might lead to the wring and prejudicial decisions in the future.
sentences.chinese: 存貨盤點可避免任何會對未來決策評估之誤導。

sentences.english: 2 approved by store manager, and then accounting head shall execute inventory procedure.
sentences.chinese: 經由店長覈准後，由會計處長完成存貨盤點程序。

sentences.english: Be responsible to calculate the vehicles in the stock;
sentences.chinese: 負責對庫存商品車進行盤點工作。

sentences.english: It is crucial that we set aside one day per year for our product inventory.
sentences.chinese: 我們每一年挪出一天盤點貨物是很重要的。

sentences.english: To do well every time period's stocktaking work according to the schedule.
sentences.chinese: 按計劃搞好各時段的盤點工作。

sentences.english: The audit outcome through this system helps in offering reference in organization decision.
sentences.chinese: 本系統之盤點結果，有助於提供組織決策參考之用。

sentences.english: Stock-taking today. Business as usual tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今日盤點，明日照常營業。

definition: to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
